dmca.title: Brazilian Bikini Copycat Notice
dmca.body:
I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that the information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. This letter is an official notification under provisions of section 512(c) of the U.S. Digital Millenium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringement listed in this location

http://www.bellabeachwear.com/category.aspx?categoryID=54
http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC02
http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC03TH
http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC03TH

www.bellabeachwear.com which infringes on copyrighted content from www.mybikinibrazil.com, specifically,

http://www.mybikinibrazil.com/starcrochetbikini.html
http://www.mybikinibrazil.com/crochetbikini.html

wholly copyrighted by My Bikini Brazil, without knowledge or consent.

Google Search Results leading to illegal usage of copyright material.

Search Query: bella beachwear crochet
Infriging Web Pages: http://www.bellabeachwear.com/category.aspx?categoryID=54

Search Query: bella beach wear crochet
Infriging Web Pages: http://www.thisnext.com/item/B3B8092F/A5A04F1/Crocheted-Bikini-by-Bella

Search Query: super star crochet bikini
Infriging Web Pages: http://cgi.ebay.com/Brazilian-CROCHET-Bikini-Low-Rise-Swimsuit-Superstar-I._W0OOitemZ330116758960OOihZ014OOCategoryZ63867OOcmdZViewItem

http://www.fashioneverywear.com/category.aspx?categoryID=211

Overview: bellabeachwear.com used to sell our brand of crochet swimwear (www.mybikinibrazil.com) on their website several years ago. We used to drop ship our handmade crochet products to the customers of bellabeachwear.com when they got a new order in. We ended the relationship some 2 years ago. Which then they removed our images, content and products. Although now, just in the last year bellabeachwear.com has stolen 3 of our new and unique handmade crochet designs, found a new supplier to make copies of our designs, stole our product images from our website and also the text from our website product description.

We got them to remove our product images, but they just turned around made exact copies of our designs with their images, even using the same names of our designs, and also our copyrighted text is still on their website even after I asked them to remove it months ago. Now they are selling our copied designs with our text and product names, on ebay as well. All of this without our permission.

The specific copied material and content is as follows:

http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC01

"Crochet Bikini Super Star (PC01)
Model # PC01
Do you want to feel and look like a super star? Now you can with our brand new hand-made crochet super star bikini. Posing a hand embroidered star on your rear, you can really show your stuff on the sand this summer!

This bikini is sweet, very fine fitting to the body, and always water safe.

98% Cotten
2% Lycra"


http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC02

"Crochet Bikini )PC02)
Model# PC02
Our hand-crocheted bikinis are not see-through, or transparent. Crochet  bikinis are made out of a very high quality blend of cotton and elastic.
Unlike other crochet bikini makers, this elastic is what creates such a fine fitting bikini, stretchy and form fitting to the body, that stays great looking in and out of the water."
98% Cotton
2% Lycra

http://www.bellabeachwear.com/ProductInfo.aspx?productid=PC03TH

Crochet Bikini Sexy Thong (PC03TH)
Model # PC03TH

Our hand-crocheted bikinis are not see-through, or transparent. Crochet  bikinis are made out of a very high quality blend of cotton and elastic. Unlike other crochet bikini makers, this elastic is what creates such a fine fitting bikini, stretchy and form fitting to the body, that  stays great looking in and out of the water.

98% Cotton
2% Lycra

We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the infringing material, as specified in the DMCA, and insure that the user refrains from using or sharing with others My Bikini Brazil materials in the future.

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter.

Nothing in this letter shall serve as a waiver of any rights or remedies of My Bikini Brazil Company with respect to the infringement, all of which are expressly reserved. Should you need to contact me, I may be reached at the following address:

[Private]
Director
[private]
Garopaba, Santa Catarina
Brazil 88495-000
[Private]
[Private]@mybikinibrazil.com
